items.title: Scaling agentic AI: Inside Atlassian’s culture of experimentation
items.description: Scaling agentic AI isn’t just about having the latest tools -- it requires clear guidance and a culture that champions experimentation.

items.title: Hugging Face just launched a $299 robot that could disrupt the entire robotics industry
items.description: Hugging Face launches Reachy Mini, a $299 open-source desktop robot that democratizes AI development for millions of builders worldwide.

items.title: MCP isn’t KYC-ready: Why regulated sectors are wary of open agent exchanges
items.description: Model Context Protocol, or MCP, is gaining momentum. But, not everyone is fully onboard yet, as financial institutions sit and wait before adoption.

items.title: As AI use expands, platforms like Brain Max seek to simplify cross-app integration
